name: PathVariable
description: Entity to document the path variable of a REST service

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the value of which the field will be

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Default value that the field will have

attributes.name: dateFormat
attributes.description: If the field is of type date you can put a specific format

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Determine if the form will make the field required
